channel.title: sUpEp PkZ 525 new client! best graphics! made an easy read me for help!
channel.description:
download link!! [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?mwnzon3vify]http://www.mediafire.com/?mwnzon3vify[/url]
features;; - all specs, perfict timers - all emotes, timers, and the turkey emote - best gfx such as arrows, dbow spec looks beast! - dclaws spec makes you jump in the air and do a back flip after spec for an extra 5th hit **100% me** - best client, connects to 127.0.1.1 u can change, **read readme for instrustions**
sorry no pics, photobucket is blocked, so is all the image sharing websites, damn mom and dad!
well hope you like!
dl link [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?mwnzon3vify]http://www.mediafire.com/?mwnzon3vify[/url]
credits 70% kids-scape 25% me 5% tuts, and my friend for the back jumping graphic, and emote for dclaws..
